doc.title: Plugins
doc.content:
Wakamiti does not have defined steps on its own, but they are provided by different plugins. Currently, the following exist, but you can also develop your own plugins!

  • REST steps
  • Database steps
  • AMQP steps
  • HTML report
  • Cucumber report
  • File Uploader
  • Appium steps
  • Azure Integration
  • Email steps
  • Groovy
